name: §a§nElven Roots
description: Elven blood still runs in your veins.

text: Instead of being raised in Oak Forests like your Light Elven counterparts, you are raised in Dark Oak Forests.
You spawn in a Dark Oak Forest.
Due to a bug right now, this will softlock your game. This power has been disabled meaning you will not spawn in a Dark Oak Forest.
Growing up in a forest has given you the ability to harvest wood blocks in a more efficient manner.
You break wood related blocks §a50%§r faster.
As an Elf, you are naturally able to handle weapons, tools, and items effectively.
